preqs: OHS1000 and either PTG1531 or PTG1542 or VIS1112, or FNA1212

rules.ruleString: (Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {FNA1212, PTG1531, PTG1542, VIS1112} and Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {OHS1000})

description: This Painting 3B unit extends the rigorous program to broaden students' awareness of concepts and techniques across a range of approaches, and further encourage them to seek appropriate solutions. Continued research and investigation of materials and processes fosters the acquisition of technical language, and influences appropriate choices to realise concepts within the context of a developing personal visual language. The emphasis is more on self-motivated approaches than on set projects. Teaching methods therefore tend to concentrate on individual tuition and group critique. This unit continues to focus on the nexus between art making and the cultural and social contexts of art.
faculty: Faculty of Art, Design and Architecture
